column4: hey guys im having a problem with ftping in ubuntu(using fireftp in firefox. It works fine on windows. I am trying to ftp to my xbox1 (not360). I keep getting error "pasv is not implemented" if i uncheck use pasv then i get "502 noop is not implemented". It works fine in windows using FlashFXP
try the built in ftp in the places menu or proftpd
that works fine. the built in one. thanks
sounds like it was an issue with the app then ;)
